participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Jake enjoys outdoor activities and values family. He has a competitive spirit.
participant_1.background: My favorite activity is fishing. My favorite thing to do is float the river. My dad was a cop until he was killed. I can't go a single day without eating ice cream. I once ran the mile in under 4 minutes.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and laid-back, Mike enjoys simple pleasures and takes pride in his work. He has a love for good food and the outdoors.
participant_2.background: I am a roofer. I always have a beer after work. My favorite food is steak cooked well done. I drive a lifted Chevy truck.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a roofer.
That sounds like hard work.
It is, but it's rewarding.
I bet. What's your favorite part about it?
The satisfaction of seeing a job well done.
I can understand that. What's your least favorite part?
The weather. It's tough working outside in the hot sun or the cold rain.
That's for sure. What do you do for fun?
I like to go fishing, float the river, and go to concerts.
I love fishing too! What's your favorite fish to catch?
I like to catch bass.
Me too! They're such a fun fish to catch.
Yeah, they are. What's your favorite way to cook them?
I like to fry them.
Me too! They're so good fried.
So, what's your favorite concert you've ever been to?
I saw the Rolling Stones in concert a few years ago. It was amazing.
I've always wanted to see them in concert. They're one of my favorite bands.
They're amazing live. You should definitely see them if you get the chance.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
